Week 38.Describe your feelings: I am feeling anxious about the decision of whether to go ahead with the pregnancy or not. There are a lot of uncertainties and conflicting emotions in my mind.
Week 38.Describe any symptoms: I have been feeling quite tired and emotionally up and down. I also experience some nausea from time to time.
Week 38.Highlights of the Week: Had a heart-to-heart conversation with my boyfriend about the pregnancy and our future plans.
Week 38.Highlight of the week: Having a deep and honest discussion with my boyfriend was a big step forward in addressing our concerns and fears.
Week 38.My Goal: To make a decision about the pregnancy that is best for me and my child, considering all factors involved.
Week 38.Your goal: To ensure the well-being of myself and my unborn child, whatever decision I make.
Week 38.To Do List:
1. Schedule a doctor's appointment for further advice and guidance
2. Research and gather more information on options available
3. Talk to a counselor or therapist for emotional support and clarity
Week 38.Notes: It's completely normal to feel overwhelmed and uncertain in such a situation. Remember to prioritize your own well-being and seek support from loved ones.
